titles.title: May We Be A Shining Light To The Nations

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
May we be a shining light to the nations,
A shining light to the peoples of the earth

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Till the whole world sees the glory of Your Name,
May your pure light shine through us.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
May we bring a word of hope to the nations;
A word of life to the peoples of the earth.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Till the whole world knows there's salvation
Through Your name,

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: May your mercy flow through us.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
May we be a healing balm to the nations
A healing balm to the peoples of the earth

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Till the whole world knows the power of Your name
May your healing flow through us

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
May we sing a song of joy to the nations
A song of praise to the peoples of the earth

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: Till the whole world rings with the praises of your name,

verse.name: v10
verse.lines: May your song be sung through us

verse.name: v11
verse.lines:
May your kingdom come to the nations
Your will be done in the peoples of the earth

verse.name: v12
verse.lines: Till the whole world knows that Jesus Christ is Lord

verse.name: v13
verse.lines: May your kingdom come in us
